adept.common

Class RelationMention

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.Item
      • adept.common.HltContent
        • adept.common.RelationMention
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class RelationMention
extends HltContent
implements Serializable

    Represents a textual relation. This class has been newly introduced in the Adept API release v2.0.

    The relation mention arguments are restricted to the types EntityMention and TimePhrase. In future releases, arguments will also be allowed to reference a numerical value.

    Instances of this class may be assigned as provenances to instances of type DocumentRelation.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
